import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import Menu from '../home/Menu' import { Context } from '../../contexts/Context' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CurrencyFormat from 'react-currency-format'; export const CheckOut = () => { const { cart, total, getTotal } = useContext(Context); useEffect(() => { getTotal(); }, []) useEffect(() => { 'use strict' window.addEventListener('load', function () { // Fetch all the forms we want to apply custom Bootstrap validation styles to var forms = document.getElementsByClassName('needs-validation') // Loop over them and prevent submission Array.prototype.filter.call(forms, function (form) { form.addEventListener('submit', function (event) { if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault() event.stopPropagation() } form.classList.add('was-validated') }, false) }) }, false) }, []) return ( <>

Your cart {cart.length}

    {cart.map(item => (
  • {item.name}
    Số lượng: {item.count}
    {value}} />
    • ))}
